name: Komaeda Joins the Circus | DEMO
description:
This game was made mainly to joke around. This is just a demo and is nowhere near done. I'm planning on making it much better. Yes, it will remain free permanently.

-

If you were insulted, told you were an ugly clown and you should go join the circus, you wouldn't actually do it. Nobody would, right?

Wrong.

After being called an ugly clown by Hiyoko Saionji, Komaeda takes it seriously and goes to the local circus and becomes a clown. Being taught by professional clown Kokichi Ouma, Komaeda soon will be the best clown to exist.
